name: Mulysa
description:
Inject yourself with adrenaline and take all the psychedlics in order to stave off Death while you wheel around the hospital in this high-strung, anxiety-inducing thriller.

Controls: WASD

Gameplay:
Keep an eye out for bouncing exclamation marks as those are the randomly-placed items you'll need to wheel away from Death. You will get either Adrenaline or Psychedelics (check the top left to see how much you have remaining). Adrenaline will buff your speed while Psychedelics expand your view window.

But watch out! Every door is a one-way door. Once  you go thru, you won't be able to go back and you'll be forced to continue wandering until you find your way back.
